You edit the app. You save your updates and run the app. When you test the app, you discover you deleted a screen.

You need to restore the last published version of the app.

What is the version number of the app after you successfully restore it?

If you restore the last published version of the app, the version number would remain the same as the last published version, which is version 18 in this case. You are developing a canvas app to monitor time. The app includes a Text Input control named TIC1 and a Timer control named TIM1.

You need to set TIM1 to a default value.

What should you do?

choices.A: Assign the Text property of TIC1 to the OnSelect property of a TIM1.
choices.D: Assign the Text property of TIC1 to the Duration property of TIM1.
choices.B: Assign the Text property of TIC1 to the OnTimerStart property of the TIM1.
choices.C: Set the Text property of TIC1 to the current system time.
